text: Mario Tennis Aces is a tennis video game for the Nintendo Switch. It is the 8th installment in the Mario Tennis series. It features matches that can be played in singles, involving only two players, or doubles, involving two pairs of players. In every match, there is a server and a receiver. It switches sides at the start of every game. title: Mario Tennis Aces
